606.title: Twitter provide archives of their terms

tosdr.case: This service provides archives of their Terms of Service so that changes can be viewed over time
tosdr.tldr: At https://twitter.com/tos/previous you can see previous versions of Twitter's terms

756.quoteText:
You can download certain account information, including your Tweets, by following the instructions here.
On Periscope, you can request correction, deletion, or modification of your personal data, and download your account information, by following the instructions here.
756.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data

tosdr.case: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data
tosdr.tldr: There is a button in the account settings to retrieve an archive of all your tweets.

779.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
779.quote: Third-Party Service Providers: Twitter uses a variety of third-party services to help provide our Services, such as hosting our various blogs and wikis, and to help us understand the use of our Services, such as Google Analytics. These third-party service providers may collect information sent by your browser as part of a web page request, such as cookies or your IP address.
779.quoteText: They may also collect other personal data from you, such as cookie identifiers or your IP address.
779.title: Third party cookies

tosdr.case: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.
tosdr.tldr: Twitter uses third-party services that may collect your information, using cookies for instance. Twitter uses Google Analytics.

4595.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
tosdr.tldr: The Privacy Policy states "We do not support the Do Not Track browser option."

5833.quoteText: In any case, you must be at least 13 years old, or in the case of Periscope 16 years old, to use the Services.
5833.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age

5835.quoteText:
You are responsible for safeguarding your account, so use a strong password and limit its use to this account.
We cannot and will not be liable for any loss or damage arising from your failure to comply with the above.
5835.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

tosdr.case: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

5848.quoteText: You may end your legal agreement with Twitter at any time by deactivating your accounts and discontinuing your use of the Services.
5848.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time

5849.quoteText: You can also download information you have shared on Twitter
5849.title: This service provides a way for you to export your data

tosdr.case: This service provides a way for you to export your data

5850.quoteText: We also reserve the right to access, read, preserve, and disclose any information as we reasonably believe is necessary to (i) satisfy any applicable law, regulation, legal process or governmental request
5850.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you

tosdr.case: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you

5851.quoteText: You understand and agree that the Services are provided to you on an “AS IS” and “AS AVAILABLE” basis.
5851.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

tosdr.case: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

5852.quoteText:
3.4

Affiliates and Change of Ownership

In the event that we are involved in a bankruptcy, merger, acquisition, reorganization, or sale of assets, your personal data may be sold or transferred as part of that transaction.
5852.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

tosdr.case: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

5853.quoteText: We use this information for things like keeping your account secure and showing you more relevant Tweets, people to follow, events, and ads.
5853.title: The service uses your personal data for advertising

tosdr.case: The service uses your personal data for advertising

5854.quoteText: We may also remove or refuse to distribute any Content on the Services
5854.title: The service can delete specific content without prior notice and without a reason

tosdr.case: The service can delete specific content without reason and may do it without prior notice

8553.quoteText: Twitter’s failure to enforce any right or provision of these Terms will not be deemed a waiver of such right or provision
8553.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

tosdr.case: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

8554.quoteText:
>

In the event that any provision of these Terms is held to be invalid or unenforceable, then that provision will be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary, and the remaining provisions of these Terms will remain in full force and effect.
8554.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

tosdr.case: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
